The Ancient Guardian is a quest monster that is encountered at the end of Below Ice Mountain.

Players can choose to kill this golem through standard combat, but lower levelled players are recommended to mine the four structural pillars in the corners of the room; this will cause some rocks to fall down and damage it.

Despite being a golem, it is not weak to golembane weapons like the Barronite mace.

The '''Ancient Guardian''' is a [[quest]] monster that is encountered at the end of [[Below Ice Mountain]].

Players can choose to kill this [[Golem_(Ruins_of_Camdozaal)|golem]] through standard combat, but lower levelled players are recommended to mine the four [[structural pillar]]s in the corners of the room; this will cause some rocks to fall down and damage it. 

Despite being a golem, it is not [[Golem (attribute)#Excluded monsters|weak to golembane weapons]] like the [[Barronite mace]].

{{Below Ice Mountain}}
{{Ruins of Camdozaal}}
